title: 1999 Chevy Tahoe
description: Great reliable vehicle. Has around 175,000 miles on it and recently was serviced and has newer tires. Feel free to make an offer!

title: Kids Downhill Skis
description: Selling my kids skis they out grew. All skis come with boots and poles.

title: 14' Bassboat
description: Great small boat for fishing smaller lakes. Outboard winterized every year, and the boat stored in garage when not in use.

title: John Deere Lawn Mower
description: Cuts grass with ease. An older model but never had any issues with it. Around 200 hrs of run time on it.

title: Trampoline
description: Kids moved to college looking to sell our trampoline. Comes with kids safety net. Always stored inside over winter.

title: Air Fryer
description: Works really well. Upgraded to a bigger model as my family grows.

title: Gaming PC
description: Built it myself. Sad to let this beauty go.

title: 75 inch Sony Smart TV
description: Great TV for watch sports and movies.

title: Patio Chairs
description: These chairs are amazing for hanging around the fire or just relaxing.

title: Wheelbarrow
description: Looking to get rid of our old wheelbarrow.

title: 2009 Moped Scooter
description: Want to sell this scooter. Bought it for college and am moving to a different state where I will not use it.

title: 2010 Honda Civic
description: Just got a new car and looking to sell my Civic. Has 200,000 miles but runs great with no issues. A great car for a new driver!

title: 1987 Porche 944 Turbo S
description: A classic sports car that anyone can afford. Only 50,000 original miles. Everything original. Car runs ok but could use a tune up and new tires. Interior leather starting to show its age.

title: Pickle Ball Set
description: Looking to sell my pickleball set. I tore my rotator cuff diving for a long ball and will no longer be able to play

title: Bacce Ball Set
description: A classic yard game, just got a new set and want to see this one go to a good new home.

title: Fishing Equipment
description: I am selling my whole fishing set as I am moving to a new town with no lakes. 3 bait casting poles, 2 spinning reels and all the necessary tackle and two nets

title: Kids Scooters
description: Cleaning out the garage and getting rid of some of my kids old stuff they dont use anymore.

title: Set of New Tires
description: I have a set of 4 new snow tires that I never used. Bought for my car but they didn't work and now I'm stuck with them.

title: King Bedroom Set
description: Downsizing and selling our king sized bedroom set. Comes with headboard and bed frame as well as two matching end tables.

title: Sectional Couch
description: Moving to an apartment and geting rid of furniture that will no longer fit in my new place. Great sectional couche from IKEA, a little wear and tear but still in great condition.
